participant_abstract.sent: Marketing and manufacting indicate that the remote control should incorporate the fruits and vegetables trends and that the types of materials required for the ipod wheelie touch-based graphical interface system.
Emphasis is being placed on keeping it simple and to the 12-euro cost of manufacture.
The focus on the simplicity of the look of the remote is important and we all agree that the wheelie alone will be sufficient to control a television.

There will be a central button to turn it on and off (press for longer than one second) as well as to bring up a menu on the television screen to control options like brightness, language, closed-captioning, timer and etc. (press one second) which will be used in conjunction with the wheelie.
